resources.string: Enable NFC, in addition to normal usage when the screen is on, when the:
phone is locked, but the screen is on
screen is off (regardless of lock state)
To have NFC behaviour return to the default (only enabled when the screen is on and the phone unlocked), either uninstall this mod or disable this module in Xposed Installer.
Play a sound when an NFC tag is lost

Change this value to reduce battery consumption when the device is kept on an NFC tag
Change the timeout of checking for an NFC tag when the device is placed on one. A lower value means lower battery consumption while the device is on the tag. Values in milliseconds (1s = 1000ms)
